Package dev.zwazel.chatbots.classes.dao

Class Dao<T,I extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
dev.zwazel.chatbots.classes.dao.Dao<T,I>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the entity.
I - The type of the primary key.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatbotDao, QuestionAnswerDao, RatingDao, TextDao, UserDao
public class Dao<T,I extends Serializable> extends Object
Utility class for DAO layer. Used to get the EntityManagerFactory and EntityManager. CRUD operations are implemented in this class.
Since:
0.3
Author:
Zwazel
